definition: big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother
flower/blossom/CL:朵[duo3],支[zhi1],束[shu4],把[ba3],盆[pen2],簇[cu4]/fancy pattern/florid/to spend (money, time)/(coll.) lecherous/lustful

sentences.english: Don't ask me what. I'm not quite at the growing-dahlia stage.
sentences.chinese: 不要再問了，在大麗花生長期我容易失態。

sentences.english: Burned clothes lay in the garden, next to a plot of yellow dahlias.
sentences.chinese: 花園裏的一簇大麗花旁，燒過的衣服橫七豎八地躺着。

sentences.english: They brought me a quilled, yellow dahlia.
sentences.chinese: 他們帶給我一朵黃色針瓣大麗花。

sentences.english: The dahlias died back when the frosts came.
sentences.chinese: 下霜以後這些大麗花便凋謝了。

sentences.english: Like the dahlia, the cornflower Centaurea cyanus belongs to class 19.
sentences.chinese: 與大麗花一樣，矢車菊也同屬19綱。

sentences.english: They brought me a quilled, yellow dahlia .
sentences.chinese: 他們帶給我一朵黃色針瓣大麗花。

sentences.english: They brought a quilled, yellow dahlia .
sentences.chinese: 他們帶來一朵黃色針瓣大麗花。

sentences.english: The dahlias died back when the frosts came.
sentences.chinese: 大麗花打霜後就枯萎了。

sentences.english: Dahlia hortensis Guill is a kind of herbaceous flower with bulbus radicular, which is very popular.
sentences.chinese: 大麗花是一種普受民間喜愛的球根草花植物。

sentences.english: Dahlias are garden plants with brightly colored flowers.
sentences.chinese: 大麗花是非常鮮豔的庭院花。

sentences.english: The dahlias died back when that first cold spelled.
sentences.chinese: 第一次寒潮襲來時，大麗花全都凋謝了。

sentences.english: The dahlias died down when we had the first cold spell.
sentences.chinese: 第一次寒潮襲來時，大麗花的枝葉枯萎而假死了。

sentences.english: The orange dahlias at Serena's table are the perfect hue for a Thanksgiving dinner.
sentences.chinese: 桌上的橙色大麗花爲美好的感恩時節錦上添花。

definition: (agriculture) to introduce a new plant variety
everything in the garden is lovely
